description: Travis Kelce’s mother, Donna Kelce, has a never heard before way of celebrating her sons’ wins, once she posted a photo of an opponent’s disappointment. Jason Kelce said it was a picture of Tom Brady who was upset after his Super Bowl LII loss. This celebration style might be coming from her longstanding banking experience, where losses seem to have a longer impact than gains.

description: Singer Palash Muchhal received interim relief from the Bombay High Court against Vidnyan Mane, who made explosive allegations about Muchhal's cancelled wedding to Smriti Mandhana. The court restrained Mane from publishing further statements, citing potential reputational damage. Mane had accused Muchhal of infidelity and financial fraud, claims Muchhal has vehemently denied.

description: A viral post has intensified debate over Candace Owens’ use of the term grooming in reference to a 15 year old. The clash highlights ongoing tensions over how serious terms are defined and used in public commentary.

description: Thousands of Palestinians have reportedly gone missing in Gaza since October 2023, with Civil Defense teams documenting at least 2,842 disappearances. Military experts suggest the use of high-temperature weapons, like thermobaric munitions, may be responsible for the extreme incineration of human tissue, leaving only biological traces.

Rahman, son of BNP founder Ziaur Rahman, is expected to become prime minister following the party's significant win, ushering in potential political stability.

description: Thailand cricketer Natthakan Chantham is diligently practicing Suryakumar Yadav's signature 'Supla shot', enduring numerous hits in her pursuit of mastering the stroke.  She aims to showcase this fearless batting style, inspired by Yadav, at the upcoming ACC Women’s Asia Cup Rising Stars 2026 in Bangkok.

title: Cisco president Jeetu Patel says company will never hire these developers
description: Cisco's president Jeetu Patel mandates AI for all developers, aiming for half a dozen AI-coded products by 2026. This shift to spec-driven development sees human teams shrink, with AI agents tripling output. While embracing AI's potential, Cisco is investing heavily in security to prevent rogue agents, urging developers to master AI to stay relevant.

title: BNP sweeps Bangladesh election: What's next for Muhammad Yunus?
description: Bangladesh's Nationalist Party has secured a decisive victory, paving the way for Tarique Rahman as prime minister. Nobel laureate Muhammad Yunus, who led the interim government after a 2024 uprising, is expected to step down. His tenure focused on restoring order and implementing reforms, but the incoming government will face challenges of political polarization and foreign policy recalibration.

description: The CIA's new Chinese-language recruitment video, targeting China's military, has sparked outrage in Beijing. The clip depicts a PLA officer disillusioned by corruption, a theme echoed by recent purges of top generals. China vows "all necessary measures" against foreign espionage, escalating intelligence rivalry amid US efforts to rebuild its China network.

Why Nehru recognised Tibet as a part of China — CDS Anil Chauhan explains
description: Chief of Defence Staff General Anil Chauhan stated that Jawaharlal Nehru recognized Tibet as part of China to foster a strong relationship, recalling the Panchsheel agreement. He emphasized that India must reconsider its perspective on Himalayan boundaries, particularly in Uttarakhand's middle sector, where the Himalayas have historically served as interaction zones.

description: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the equity benchmarks, crashed in trade on Friday amid weak global cues and the continued IT stocks selloff. While Nifty50 went below 25,600, BSE Sensex was down over 700 points.

title: Patrick Mahomes and Brittany Mahomes make $1M move before season
description: Patrick Mahomes, the Kansas City Chiefs’ star player, is fully focused on recovering from his brutal injuries, after recording a pretty tough time on the field in the last season. As he focuses on his recovery, Patrick Mahomes and his wife, Brittany Mahomes, just pulled off a million dollar move, away from the world of NFL, which has now broken records.

title: Marvel Rivals Season 6.5 release timings for all regions
description: Marvel Rivals gears up for its major mid-season update, Season 6.5, launching February 13, 2026. The highly anticipated addition is Elsa Bloodstone, the 47th playable hero and a new Duelist. This update also promises significant meta-shifting balance changes and a Valentine's Day celebration, enhancing the hero shooter experience for players worldwide.

title: After CEO asked employees to stop coding, Nvidia engineers get access to OpenAI's Codex
description: Nvidia has deployed OpenAI's Codex AI coding tool to all 30,000 engineers, marking a significant enterprise rollout. CEO Jensen Huang's mandate to automate tasks with AI is driving this adoption, with engineers praising the tool's ability to handle complex workflows and maintain context.

title: After Ford lost nearly $5 billion, CEO Jim Farley says: We got the message that ...
description: Ford's electric vehicle unit reported a significant $4.8 billion loss in 2025 as sales of key models declined. Facing slowing EV demand and rising hybrid interest, the automaker is pivoting to extended-range EVs and developing a lower-cost EV platform. Ford anticipates its EV business will remain unprofitable until around 2029.
